resources.string: Would you like to try uploading any of the following?
Enter a new name for your data set:
What would you like to do with this data set?
Enter or select an experiment you would like to upload to. Alternatively, select \"No Experiment\" to record all possible data and select an experiment later.

Your device does not have the proper Barcode Scanner application installed to use this feature. However, you may visit the Google Play store to download this application (\"Barcode Scanner\" by the Zxing Team).
